title: Mara ọkwa - Temple Orbital
heading: Ga-amara gị ọkwa mgbe ọ na-ebili
description:
Na Nọvemba 28, 2025, Templelọ nsọ Orbital ga-arịgo.
Hapụ ozi-e gị, anyị ga-agwa gị mgbe ọ ruru oghere.

form.successMessage: Anyị ga-erute gị mgbe ọ rịgoro.
form.errorMessage: Ọ nwere ihe adịghị mma. Biko nwaa ọzọ.
